description:
Agastia`s latest monster, Mummy, has Blader on the ropes... until a particular sight takes away her will to fight. Mummy wants to reject the role she was designed for and create a new lifestyle. But can a monster without a voice make a life... as an idol?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le concept de l’être maléfique ensorcelant les âmes invoque de nouveaux démons par le chaos qu’il provoque en se noyant dans les tourments de son existence
Tamashii o Yuuwaku Suru Mashou no Mono ga, Mizukara no Sonzai ni Madoi Mayoi Oboreru Toki, Konton o Motarashita Sono Sonzai no Gainen Koso ga Akuma to Yobareru
The Very Concept of the Evil Being That Bewitches Souls Summons New Demons Through the Chaos It Brings When It Drowns in Turmoil Over Its Puzzling Existence
魂を誘惑する魔性の者が, 自らの存在に惑い迷い溺れる時, 混沌をもたらしたその存在の概念こそが悪魔と呼ばれる
